metadata.title: CVE-2020-1472 on Ubuntu 20.04 LTS (focal) - medium
metadata.description:
An elevation of privilege vulnerability exists when an attacker establishesa vulnerable Netlogon secure channel connection to a domain controller,using the Netlogon Remote Protocol (MS-NRPC). An attacker who successfullyexploited the vulnerability could run a specially crafted application on adevice on the network. To exploit the vulnerability, an unauthenticatedattacker would be required to use MS-NRPC to connect to a domain controllerto obtain domain administrator access. Microsoft is addressing thevulnerability in a phased two-part rollout. These updates address thevulnerability by modifying how Netlogon handles the usage of Netlogonsecure channels. For guidelines on how to manage the changes required forthis vulnerability and more information on the phased rollout, see How tomanage the changes in Netlogon secure channel connections associated withCVE-2020-1472 (updated September 28, 2020). When the second phase ofWindows updates become available in Q1 2021, customers will be notified viaa revision to this security vulnerability. If you wish to be notified whenthese updates are released, we recommend that you register for the securitynotifications mailer to be alerted of content changes to this advisory. SeeMicrosoft Technical Security Notifications.

    Update Instructions:

    Run `sudo pro fix CVE-2020-1472` to fix the vulnerability. The problem can be corrected
    by updating your system to the following package versions:

ctdb - 2:4.11.6+dfsg-0ubuntu1.4
libnss-winbind - 2:4.11.6+dfsg-0ubuntu1.4
libpam-winbind - 2:4.11.6+dfsg-0ubuntu1.4
libsmbclient - 2:4.11.6+dfsg-0ubuntu1.4
libwbclient0 - 2:4.11.6+dfsg-0ubuntu1.4
python3-samba - 2:4.11.6+dfsg-0ubuntu1.4
registry-tools - 2:4.11.6+dfsg-0ubuntu1.4
samba - 2:4.11.6+dfsg-0ubuntu1.4
samba-common - 2:4.11.6+dfsg-0ubuntu1.4
samba-common-bin - 2:4.11.6+dfsg-0ubuntu1.4
samba-dsdb-modules - 2:4.11.6+dfsg-0ubuntu1.4
samba-libs - 2:4.11.6+dfsg-0ubuntu1.4
samba-testsuite - 2:4.11.6+dfsg-0ubuntu1.4
samba-vfs-modules - 2:4.11.6+dfsg-0ubuntu1.4
smbclient - 2:4.11.6+dfsg-0ubuntu1.4
winbind - 2:4.11.6+dfsg-0ubuntu1.4
No subscription required

criterions.comment: samba package in focal, is related to the CVE in some way and has been fixed (note: '2:4.11.6+dfsg-0ubuntu1.4').
